name: Herald roll (Early Development Stage)
description:
You play as Erlich, a noble and skillful warrior. As order by your higher authority you set out on a journey to collect important scrolls that your kingdom must acquire. Your martial arts skills and combo attacks are at your disposal. 

This game is a 3D action platformer, conceptually based on the video games        such as Sonic and Crash Bandicoot etc.

Your task is to make it to the end of each level, where you will get important information regarding .

To achieve this you move Erlich through the levels,platforms and avoiding traps and enemies.
